channel.title: WSGIHandler on 卡塞尔的博客
channel.description: Recent content in WSGIHandler on 卡塞尔的博客

item.title: django WSGIHandler
item.description: WSGIHandler class WSGIHandler(base.BaseHandler): request_class = WSGIRequest def __init__(self, *args, **kwargs): super().__init__(*args, **kwargs) self.load_middleware() def __call__(self, environ, start_response): set_script_prefix(get_script_name(environ)) signals.request_started.send(sender=self.__class__, environ=environ) # WSGIRequest对象 -> HttpRequest类 # def echo(request, *args, **kwargs): # data = request.GET # ret_value = data.get('name', 'world') # return HttpResponse(ret_value, content_type='text/plain') # 在 app/view/echo 中,
